title: "Huge Disappointment...": Ukraine President Reacts To PM Modi's Russia Visit
content: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has reacted sharply to Prime Minister Narendra Modi's brief visit to Russia and his interaction with Russian President Vladimir Putin.
summary: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has reacted sharply to Prime Minister Narendra Modi's brief visit to Russia and his interaction with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: Kyiv Children Hospital Was Probably Directly Hit By Russian Missile: UN
content: The United Nations on Tuesday said there was a "high likelihood" that the children's hospital in Kyiv suffered "a direct hit" from a Russian missile.
summary: The United Nations on Tuesday said there was a "high likelihood" that the children's hospital in Kyiv suffered "a direct hit" from a Russian missile.

title: Explained: Why RIPCartoonNetwork Has Become The Top Trend
content: A rumour that Cartoon Network is shutting down sent shockwaves across the Internet. So much so that the hashtag RIPCartoonNetwork became the top trend.
summary: A rumour that Cartoon Network is shutting down sent shockwaves across the Internet. So much so that the hashtag RIPCartoonNetwork became the top trend.

title: Explainer: Why Democrats Are Urging Biden To Step Out Of Presidential Race
content: Citing concerns about his health and ability to take on Donald Trump, prominent House Democrats have doubted Joe Biden's fitness for office and his chances of winning in 2024.
summary: Citing concerns about his health and ability to take on Donald Trump, prominent House Democrats have doubted Joe Biden's fitness for office and his chances of winning in 2024.

title: Dog Turns On Stove In US House, Apple HomePad Alerts Owners Of Fire
content: A pet dog's curiosity almost turned deadly for a family in the US after the family pet accidentally switched on the stove at night while its owners were asleep. The family was saved from disaster after their Apple HomePad sent them an alert.
summary: A pet dog's curiosity almost turned deadly for a family in the US after the family pet accidentally switched on the stove at night while its owners were asleep. The family was saved from disaster after their Apple HomePad sent them an alert.

title: Singapore's Hell Theme Park Dead Serious About Afterlife
content: Gory grottos with demons impaling sinners on stakes and people drowning in a pool of blood are not part of your average theme park experience.
summary: Gory grottos with demons impaling sinners on stakes and people drowning in a pool of blood are not part of your average theme park experience.

title: Most Cancer Patients Die Of "Cachexia", Not Cancer: Read Details
content: When tumours in cancer patients elevate levels of an immune system molecule called Interleukin-6 (IL-6), it can cause severe brain dysfunction, which leads to a lethal wasting disease called 'cachexia' in about 50 to 80% cancer patients, a study said
summary: When tumours in cancer patients elevate levels of an immune system molecule called Interleukin-6 (IL-6), it can cause severe brain dysfunction, which leads to a lethal wasting disease called 'cachexia' in about 50 to 80% cancer patients, a study said

title: "No Disruption" To Production Despite Workers Strike: Samsung
content: South Korean tech giant Samsung said Tuesday that production was not being disrupted despite a three-day general strike by thousands of workers.
summary: South Korean tech giant Samsung said Tuesday that production was not being disrupted despite a three-day general strike by thousands of workers.

title: Climate Change: How Cyclones And Hurricanes Will Change As The Earth Warms
content: When Hurricane Beryl hit the Grenadine Islands on July 1, its 150-mph winds and awesome storm surge made it the earliest category 5 storm (the most destructive grade on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane wind scale) the tropical Atlantic has seen.
summary: When Hurricane Beryl hit the Grenadine Islands on July 1, its 150-mph winds and awesome storm surge made it the earliest category 5 storm (the most destructive grade on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane wind scale) the tropical Atlantic has seen.

title: Meet The Democrats Who May Take Joe Biden's Place In Presidential Race
content: Not that there weren't enough questions already about an 81-year-old seeking re-election to the highest US office, but the first Presidential debate compelled Democrats to ask, "Does Joe Biden have what it takes to defeat Donald Trump again?"
summary: Not that there weren't enough questions already about an 81-year-old seeking re-election to the highest US office, but the first Presidential debate compelled Democrats to ask, "Does Joe Biden have what it takes to defeat Donald Trump again?"

title: 6 "Ninja Turtle Gang" Members Arrested In Malaysia, Tortoises Seized
content: Malaysian authorities have arrested six members of an international crime ring known as the "Ninja Turtle Gang" and seized about 200 smuggled tortoises and turtles, a wildlife official said Tuesday.
summary: Malaysian authorities have arrested six members of an international crime ring known as the "Ninja Turtle Gang" and seized about 200 smuggled tortoises and turtles, a wildlife official said Tuesday.

title: River Seine To Have Flying Taxi Landing Pad At Paris Olympics
content: France's government on Tuesday gave the go-ahead for construction of a floating landing pad on the River Seine for flying taxis set to be shown off during the Paris Olympics.
summary: France's government on Tuesday gave the go-ahead for construction of a floating landing pad on the River Seine for flying taxis set to be shown off during the Paris Olympics.

title: "Till Last Ball...": PM's T20 Win Mention In Address To Indians In Russia
content: India is transforming at a record pace and the world is taking note, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said today at an event organised by the Indian community in Russia's Moscow.
summary: India is transforming at a record pace and the world is taking note, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said today at an event organised by the Indian community in Russia's Moscow.

title: 'Bob's Burgers' Actor Pleads Guilty To Charges Over January 6 US Riots
content: The 54-year-old faces up to five years in prison for the felony count of civil disorder.
summary: The 54-year-old faces up to five years in prison for the felony count of civil disorder.

title: Porn Star Jesse Jane Died Of Drug Overdose, Reveals Autopsy
content: Adult film star Jesse Jane died from an accidental overdose of fentanyl and cocaine toxicity in January 2024, herautopsy report has confirmed. Her body was found in a decomposed state, it stated.
summary: Adult film star Jesse Jane died from an accidental overdose of fentanyl and cocaine toxicity in January 2024, herautopsy report has confirmed. Her body was found in a decomposed state, it stated.

title: American Mountaineer Found Mummified In Peru 22 Years After Vanishing
content: The preserved body of an American mountaineer -- who disappeared 22 years ago while scaling a snowy peak in Peru -- has been found after being exposed by climate change-induced ice melt, police said Monday.
summary: The preserved body of an American mountaineer -- who disappeared 22 years ago while scaling a snowy peak in Peru -- has been found after being exposed by climate change-induced ice melt, police said Monday.

title: Wheel Falls From Boeing Plane In Los Angeles, No Injuries Reported
content: A Boeing jetliner taking off from Los Angeles lost a wheel Monday, the latest in a string of safety scares for the aerospace giant.
summary: A Boeing jetliner taking off from Los Angeles lost a wheel Monday, the latest in a string of safety scares for the aerospace giant.

title: I Think Joe Biden Will Stay In White House Race: Donald Trump
content: Donald Trump said in an interview Monday night that he thinks President Joe Biden will stay in the race for the White House despite calls for him to drop out over concerns about his mental fitness.
summary: Donald Trump said in an interview Monday night that he thinks President Joe Biden will stay in the race for the White House despite calls for him to drop out over concerns about his mental fitness.

title: "Run Against Me": Defiant Biden Digs In, Challenges Critics Within Party
content: President Joe Biden insisted again Monday he would not quit the US election race, as the White House denied he had Parkinson's disease following a disastrous debate performance.
summary: President Joe Biden insisted again Monday he would not quit the US election race, as the White House denied he had Parkinson's disease following a disastrous debate performance.

title: Kamala Harris vs Donald Trump? Polls Suggest Close Race If Joe Biden Exits
content: Recent polls suggest that Kamala Harris could perform better than Joe Biden in a hypothetical matchup against former President Donald Trump.
summary: Recent polls suggest that Kamala Harris could perform better than Joe Biden in a hypothetical matchup against former President Donald Trump.
